hero_title: Learn the technology you need in 7 and 30 days
hero_description: DevSteps is a project-focused, completely free learning platform that takes you one step further every day with short-term written courses.
landing_courses_description: Explore our most popular courses and begin your journey
why_description: Our short-term courses are prepared with the collective knowledge of the community and support you with projects every day.
feature_community_description: Every course is written by the community on GitHub. You learn the topics you need with collective wisdom.
feature_projects_description: Apply concepts with mini projects you'll complete every day, produce while you learn.
feature_free_description: All content is open source and accessible to everyone. Only your desire to learn is enough.
paths_title: Choose your rhythm, build healthy habits
paths_description: Lay the foundation with 7-day sprints, master with 30-day journeys. All free, all from the community.
path_7_description: A quick warm-up tour for beginners.
path_30_description: Comprehensive learning journey with a small project every day.
path_custom_description: Missing a topic in the library? Create it with the community.
faq_description: What you need to know to get the most out of the DevSteps experience
faq_1_answer: DevSteps offers free courses written by the community so you can quickly learn the technology you need.
faq_2_answer: Programs are determined by the community. For example, we are planning a 7-day quick start and a 30-day focused journey for JavaScript.
faq_3_answer: Absolutely! You can contribute to MDX content, make corrections or add new tasks through the GitHub repository.
community_title: We are building a learning library accessible to everyone
community_description: We discuss new courses on Reddit and write together on GitHub. You can contribute from day one or start learning.
footer_description: Free technology education developed by the community.
footer_copyright: Sharing is the fastest way to learn.
dialog_description: Everything is open source and accessible to everyone. You can start courses or contribute by following the steps below.
dialog_step_1_description: Daily tasks and content await you in the MDX files in the `courses` folder.
dialog_step_2_description: Share your progress, ask questions and shape new content ideas together.
dialog_step_3_title: Open a PR if you want to contribute
dialog_step_3_description: Share new content, corrections or project suggestions directly on GitHub.
browse_courses_description: Explore our community-written courses and find the perfect learning path for you.
browse_no_results_description: Try adjusting your filters or search query.
course_contributors_count: {count}+ community members have contributed to this course
course_free_description: Forever free, no credit card required
course_share_toast_description: Share this course with your friends.
error_404_description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
error_500_description: We're experiencing some technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and we're working to fix it.
lesson_assignment_description: Share your solution on GitHub and connect with the community!
lesson_assignment_step_1: Create a new repository on your GitHub account
lesson_assignment_step_2: Complete the assignment according to the requirements
lesson_assignment_step_3: Push your code to GitHub with clear commit messages
lesson_assignment_step_4: Share your repository link with the community on Reddit
lesson_discussion_description: Have questions? Want to help improve this lesson? Join our community!
